description: meta info for temporaries used by the FPLO parser, all names are expected to start with x_fplo_t_

metaInfos.description: Temporary storage for direct lattice vectors, x-component
metaInfos.name: x_fplo_t_vec_a_x

metaInfos.description: Temporary storage for direct lattice vectors, y-component
metaInfos.name: x_fplo_t_vec_a_y

metaInfos.description: Temporary storage for direct lattice vectors, z-component
metaInfos.name: x_fplo_t_vec_a_z

metaInfos.description: Temporary storage for reciprocal lattice vectors, x-component
metaInfos.name: x_fplo_t_vec_b_x

metaInfos.description: Temporary storage for reciprocal lattice vectors, y-component
metaInfos.name: x_fplo_t_vec_b_y

metaInfos.description: Temporary storage for reciprocal lattice vectors, z-component
metaInfos.name: x_fplo_t_vec_b_z

metaInfos.description: Temporary storage for atom positions, x-component
metaInfos.name: x_fplo_t_atom_positions_x

metaInfos.description: Temporary storage for atom positions, y-component
metaInfos.name: x_fplo_t_atom_positions_y

metaInfos.description: Temporary storage for atom positions, z-component
metaInfos.name: x_fplo_t_atom_positions_z

metaInfos.description: Temporary storage for FPLO atom index
metaInfos.name: x_fplo_t_atom_idx

metaInfos.description: Temporary storage for FPLO atom labels
metaInfos.name: x_fplo_t_atom_labels

metaInfos.description: Temporary storage for FPLO Wyckoff position index of each atom
metaInfos.name: x_fplo_t_atom_wyckoff_idx

metaInfos.description: Temporary storage for FPLO CPA block of each atom
metaInfos.name: x_fplo_t_atom_cpa_block
